content:
IRequestHandler Interface

Definition

Provides access to members that control handing of request messages.

In this Article

[System.ServiceModel.ServiceContract]
public interface IRequestHandler

Methods

ProcessRequestForMessage(Stream)

Provides an entry point for the request.

public System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message ProcessRequestForMessage (System.IO.Stream messageBody);
messageBody
Stream

The Stream object that contains the request.

Returns
Message

The resulting message for the supplied request.
